course_description: Promoting literacy about Hispanic cultures and developing critical thinking skills in Spanish are the foci of this Foundational Course designed to prepare students for upper-level course work in the department. With the intention of improving these two skills, students read and write about these histories, geographies, values, and artistic and literary productions of the Hispanic world.
